item.title: Http Response in Golang
item.description: In this blog post, I am going to talk about HTTP server and how to respond with different types of HTTP response(text, JSON, template) in Go. Creating a web server in Go is very simple and we can do it by writing just a few lines of code. To create an HTTP server in go you need to use net/http package. This is how a simple HTTP server code looks like in Go.
